summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1608, for the improvement of Atlantic Street, in the City of Seattle, from First Avenue South to Railroad Avenue, by constructing a plank Roadway and wood sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 17171 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
